# Module Assessments

Make sure you've gone through all the content for this module.

## Quizzes

Fill out the quiz sheets for module 1 and submit. You can find the sheet(s) for this module and submission instructions in the _Course Resources_ section.


## Exercises

For this module, you are asked to do a small project which involves producing a short personal introduction of yourself. For a detailed description and instructions, see the _Exercises_ document of this module.
